tool_description: Detailed, qualitative information on over 200 different breeds of dogs. This API provides insights into various dog breeds, including their characteristics and care requirements.

api_list.name: /v1/dogs
api_list.description: Get a list of dog breeds matching specified parameters. Returns at most 20 results. To access more than 20 results, use the offset parameter to paginate through results.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: Number of results to offset for pagination.

optional_parameters.name: energy
optional_parameters.description: How much energy the breed has. Possible values: 0 (low energy) to 5 (high energy).

optional_parameters.name: protectiveness
optional_parameters.description: How likely the breed is to alert strangers. Possible values: 0 (minimal alerting) to 5 (maximum alerting).

optional_parameters.name: trainability
optional_parameters.description: How easy it is to train the breed. Possible values: 0 (very difficult) to 5 (very easy).

optional_parameters.name: shedding
optional_parameters.description: How much hair the breed sheds. Possible values: 0 (no shedding) to 5 (maximum shedding).

optional_parameters.name: barking
optional_parameters.description: How vocal the breed is. Possible values: 0 (minimal barking) to 5 (maximum barking).
